alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 5:25PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A shower with strong, gusty winds will impact portions of northwestern Elbert and south central Arapahoe Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 523 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of gusty winds from a weak shower or sprinkle, about 5 miles northeast of Elizabeth, or 31 miles southeast of Denver, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could produce areas of blowing dust and poor visibility, and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elizabeth, Kiowa and Ponderosa Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If blowing dust is observed while traveling, slow down before entering the blowing dust.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County
